# Body

**Associated Type**

A view that represents the body of a table.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Body : View
```

## Creating custom table styles

- **makeBody(configuration:)**: Creates a view that represents the body of a table.
- **TableStyle.Configuration**: The properties of a table.

items.description: Creates a view that represents the body of a table.
items.name: makeBody(configuration:)
